contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox japan station |namerom= Yaotome |name= 八乙女 |image=Yaotome sta cropped.jpg |imagesize= |caption= Yaotome Station |pref= Miyagi |city= Sendai |ward= Izumi |address= 4-10, Yaotomechūō 1-chōme |jaloc= 仙台市泉区八乙女中央一丁目4-10 |postal= 981-3135 |coordinates={{coord|38.312889|140.884056|format=dms|type:railwaystation_region:JP|display=inline,title}} |open= 15 July 1987 |close= |oldname= |presentname= |station_number= |operator= [[Sendai Subway]] |line= [[Nanboku Line (Sendai)|Nanboku Line]] |stats= 7,297 |statsnote= 2010 |bus=y }} {{Nihongo|'''Yaotome Station'''|八乙女駅|Yaotome eki}} is a station on the [[Sendai Subway]] [[Nanboku Line (Sendai)|Nanboku Line]] in [[Izumi-ku, Sendai|Izumi-ku]], [[Sendai]], [[Miyagi Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. ==Lines== * [[Sendai Subway]] [[Nanboku Line (Sendai)|Nanboku Line]] ==Surrounding area== {{Empty section|date=July 2010}} ==History== * 15 July 1987: Station begins operation. ==Adjacent stations== {{Sendai Subway Nanboku Line}} [[Category:Railway stations in Miyagi Prefecture]] [[Category:Sendai City Subway Line]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1987]] {{Miyagi-railstation-stub}}
